results.deck: A Japanese video game developer, best known for Hydlide, one of the first action RPG's, as well as Planet Mephius, the first point & click adventure, and various golf games.
results.description: Technology and Entertainment Software, better known as T&E Soft, is a Japanese video game developer. They are best known for Hydlide, one of the first real-time action RPG's, as well as Planet Mephius, the first episodic point & click adventure, and a variety of golf games (such as Disney Golf).
results.name: T&E Soft, Inc.
